content: textured crochet patterns are great for adding a rich look to any crochet project among all the crochet projects and patterns crochet hats and beanies are the most easy and fun to make crocheted hats are the most versatile projects to make you can work with a combination of the basic crochet stitches and you can end up with a lovely textured look today am sharing the pattern for quick and easy crochet crinkle hat i made this as a part of the 2025 scarf & hat of the month cal along with rhondda from oombawka design crochet 1 and amy from the stitchin mommy 2 the crinkle hat pattern is made with the basic crochet stitches this is a quick working pattern the pattern is made by crocheting a rectangle and the sides and the top are sewed up to make a easy hat materials used - 8 ply cotton yarn - 1 skein 5mm crochet hook size - 10 inches- can be customized to any size crochet terms used - us crochet terms checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/jzc9s5wagq4 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/ 2 https //www thestitchinmommy com/
